p: Patients with chronic HEV are usually reported with persisting high ALT levels and presence of HEV RNA in their serum [ 106, 109]. However, Gerolami et al. (2008) revealed a kidney transplant patient with chronic HEV and normal serum ALT concentrations. Negative results for seroprevalence despite positive serum HEV RNA in the patient can be because of immunosuppression [ 110].
